title: Eucerin Skin Calming Dry Skin Body Wash Oil, Fragrance Free, 8.4-Ounce Bottle (Pack of 3)
Alaffia Everyday Shea Moisturizing Body Wash, Unscented, 32 oz
description: Our Everyday Shea Body Wash is a blend of aqueous neem leaf extract, traditional shea butter soap, and mild plant based surfactants. Together, these ingredients form a natural body wash that foams well and cleans completely without stripping skin's natural oils. Everyday Shea Moisturizing Body Wash is plant based, SLS free, gluten free and made without animal testing. Alaffia was created to help West African communities become sustainable through the fair trade of indigenous resources. One key to sustainability is empowerment of individuals within the communities. We encourage empowerment through our community projects, our women's cooperatives, and education and involvement in our customer communities.

title: Nivea Body Touch of Renewal Lathering Body Scrub, 12 Ounce
description: Nivea touch of renewal lathering body scrub featuring hydra IQ technology delivers an unmatched balance of exfolication. Body scrub with hydra iq. Provides exfoliation of a scrub combined with rich luxurious lather. Leaves your skin feeling healthy and beautiful with no greasy feel.

title: Neutrogena T-Gel Shampoo, Stubborn Itch Control, 4.4 Ounce
Olay Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads 2 Count
description: Exfoliation is the first step to reveal youthful, bright, even skin. Continue to experience professional-level cleansing at home with these Replacement Brush Heads for your Olay Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System or Microdermabrasion Plus Advanced Cleansing System.For best results, Olay Professional Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads should be changed every 3 months (or sooner if bristles become deformed). It's easy  just press the brush head onto the connection pin until it locks into position with a click. These soft bristle replacement face brush heads can be used with a broad range of Olay cleansers for deep daily cleansing. Professionally designed by dermatologists and Olay skin scientists, Pro-X Replacement Brush Heads remove dull skin cells and oils, giving your face a fresh and clean look. A complete skincare regimen means beautiful skin is just steps away. Keep spare brush heads handy, and your Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System will always operate at peak efficiency.
